p: Therefore, the aim of this study was to investigate the effect of the “Sailing through Adolescence” course on perceptions of students in grades 5 to 9 regarding their understanding of adolescence and its impact on life, sex, emotions, and other associated issues. A pretest–posttest design examined students' perceptions using a Perception Index of Life–Sex–Emotions Education questionnaire (PILSEE) for quantitative measures and seven questions about students' subjective perceptions for qualitative measures.
